title: If you live on East Coast, make a LAN smurf or transfer an account to it.
body: Trust me it's well worth the $20 or so that it costs and you finally obtain the ability to outplay people. Playing champions that require kiting/AA canceling/mobility etc. is easy as hell on 40-50 ping. Only downside is long ass Q times and not many English speakers but other than that it's great. Just accept that East Coast servers are NEVER going to happen and adapt to it.
